author: jacobgadikian
content:
Hi, I'm Jacob and I run validators in cosmos. I don't know what to do with information that I recently came across. There is a company called Allnodes.com and they run validators for other people, VaaS. 

They have every seed phrase for every one of their customers.

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1AIOOrHiNAFQKwzaeDNyJJJx8SwXNlaSUcZbasnezXS4/edit?usp=drivesdk

Above is a document that focuses a bit on Luna classic but this is from what I can tell a universal issue. It affects Ethereum. It affects Solana. It affects osmosis. It affects on and on and on, it's a total of 67 chains.

author: jacobgadikian
content: You can find me on Twitter, my username is Gadikian.  I don't really know what to do.
